Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander racked up 39 points in three quarters.
Isaiah Joe scored a season-high 31 points on 11-for-16 shooting.
Oklahoma City Thunder's 126-101 road victory against the New York Knicks.
The Thunder drained 10 3-pointers on 15 first-half attempts.
Isaiah Joe shot 6-for-7 from three-point range before halftime.
Joe finished with twice as many 3-pointers as the Knicks on 16 fewer attempts.
Oklahoma City shot 14-for-27 from downtown on the night.
Post-Match Reflections: Thunder coach Mark Daigneault commented on Isaiah Joe's performance, saying it opened up the game wider than usual.
Isaiah Joe mentioned that the shots came within the flow of the game and offense.
